plot: This is a semi-documentary on life of Mohammad Reza Soleymani, a worker of Iran National company, and his campaigning in the first presidential election of Islamic republic of Iran, held in 1979.
plot_es: This is a semi-documentary on life of Mohammad Reza Soleymani, a worker of Iran National company, and his campaigning in the first presidential election of Islamic republic of Iran, held in 1979.
plot_en: This is a semi-documentary on life of Mohammad Reza Soleymani, a worker of Iran National company, and his campaigning in the first presidential election of Islamic republic of Iran, held in 1979.
